titleStmt.title: Remarks upon the Reflections of the author of Popery misrepresented, &c. on his answerer, particularly as to the deposing doctrine in a letter to the author of the Reflections, together with some few animadversions on the same author's Vindication of his Reflections.
titleStmt.author: Seller, Abednego, 1646?-1705.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Abednego Seller. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

Reply to John Gother's "Reflections of the author of Popery misrepresented", and "Papists protesting against Protestant-popery ... being a vindication of the Papist misrepresented ... and the Reflexions upon the Answer."
